org.apache.flink.streaming.api.functions.aggregation

类 SumAggregator<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.streaming.api.functions.aggregation.AggregationFunction<T>

  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable, Function, ReduceFunction<T>

    @Internal
public class SumAggregator<T>
extends AggregationFunction<T>
    An AggregationFunction that sums up fields.

    • 方法详细资料

      • reduce

        public T reduce(T value1,
                T value2)
         throws java.lang.Exception
        从接口复制的说明: ReduceFunction
        The core method of ReduceFunction, combining two values into one value of the same type. The reduce function is consecutively applied to all values of a group until only a single value remains.
        参数:
        value1 - The first value to combine.
        value2 - The second value to combine.
        返回:
        The combined value of both input values.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - This method may throw exceptions. Throwing an exception will cause the operation to fail and may trigger recovery.
